data.text:
Kapil Choudhary Contact No: +91-9828603355 Email ID: kapilchoudhary086@gmail.com Gurgaon, IN CAREER AIM To work in an environment which is innovative, challenging, rewarding, which offers a profound knowledge base to enhance my talent, exposure and zeal of learning. To work amicably for the betterment of the organization and to take it to new 
 heights. PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE KonnectShift ( igital Marketing Executive [ ug 2018-Present 
 Managing digital marketing brand campaigns including creative developments, website refreshes and newsletter marketing. Creating engaging social media strategies and execution plans that cultivative audience, increased web presence and enhanced brand awareness. Monitoring the success of Social Media campaigns through Google Analytics, KPI s and Dashboards. Evaluating the effectiveness of marketing programs, provided market analysis and insight to 
 senior management. Coordinate with Marketing and Sales team as well. Handling day-to-day Search Engine Marketing activities including campaign planning , implementation, budget management, performance review and optimizing paid search campaign. Reports of campaigns with in-depth analysis on the performance of keywords, ad copies, bounce rates etc. Formulating digital strategy for delivering best ROI for campaigns on various result 
 oriented matrices of cost per click. ROOH-E-JAIPUR (Owner) [July 2018- April 2019] 
 As the Owner of Rooh-e-Jaipur , I handled multiple roles. Some of those were- 
 Business Developer As a Business Developer I managed to develop cordial business relations both B2B and B2C . 
 Link Building As the person-in-charge, I fostered the skills of link building and management which I sought important to grow my business. 
 Social Media Management I realized the importance of maintaining an active online presence for my business, hence I managed the social media accounts for Rooh-e-Jaipur which in turn brought us business. 
 Influencer Marketing I also understood the significance of influencer marketing. Hence, I had developed professional and cordial relations with influencers like food bloggers which could help to spread the word of mouth marketing for my food outlet. 
 UnlearnKids [ ept 2015 Feb 2018] Content Development Developed all the Math content for the portal. 
 Developed Highly Personalize Learning Platform using ZPD. . Managed Amazon Web Server. 
 Reviewed all the uploaded content. Responsible for all the Testings. Business Development 
 Managed sales pipeline and closing business. Developed a database of qualified leads through referrals, direct mail, email campaigns and networking. 
 Implemented sales and marketing strategies and plans. Executed some pilots across the multiple schools such as KR Mangalam Delhi, Samhita Academy Bangalore, Arwachin International School, Delhi, MM school Jabalpur. 
 Successfully converted multiple schools that contributed 40% of the revenue. Introduced improvements in business strategies based on customers feedback. 
 Generated new business both in face to face meetings and over the phone. 
 Reviewed existing contracts and looking for growth opportunities. Operations Writing accurate reports through the detailed analysis of data. 
 Responsible for all the backend changes. Handled all school implementation process. 
 Introduced NLC (Neighbourhood Learning Centre) model. Managed all NLC centres. Developed creative reports. 
 Organized events in societies and schools. Digital Marketing Assuring implementation of different digital marketing tools and 
 Techniques such as SEO, PPC advertisement, Social Media Marketing. Keyword analysis and research. 
 Web traffic analysis using various digital tools like Google Analytics. Developed creative posts for Facebook and Instagram marketing. 
 ACADEMIC QUALIFICATION Qualification Duration (%) Global Institute of Technology (RTU) 2011-15 
 62.00 SSE Children s Academy School Alwar (RBSE) 2010-11 69.08 HSE 
 Bal Bharti Sr. Sec. School Alwar (RBSE) 2008-09 77.83 B.tech (ECE) 
 Organization STRENGTHS Self-motivated, enthusiastic, dedicated and bear leadership qualities. Industrious and Optimistic team
